text:
I have Tomcat 4.0.1 configured as a JSP/Servlet engin for Apache, using Webapp. 
The http service has been removed from server.xml.  A servlet, not created from 
a JSP, has res.sendError(int, String) calls. When executed, only a blank page 
appears.  Since all else works correctly, this might be a bug.

Mike
creator: michael.f.adolf@lmco.com

text:
What does happen when you "snoop" the connection? (When you telnet to 
the Apache port and request it manually?)...
creator: pier@betaversion.org
funkman@joedog.org
text:
"mod_webapp is deprecated and unsupported due to lack of developer interest.
Please use mod_jk, or jk2"
